meanings.sent1: The reappointed manager was happy to return to work.
meanings.sent2: The reappointed team member showed great dedication to the company.
meanings.sent3: The reappointed chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The reappointed student's enthusiasm was like a fresh breeze in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The reappointed flower bloomed beautifully after the rain.

meanings.sent1: The company reappointed him as the head of the department.
meanings.sent2: The board reappointed the CEO for another term.
meanings.sent3: The school reappointed the janitor as the official mascot.
meanings.sent4: The mayor reappointed the artist to paint a mural in the town square.
meanings.sent5: The committee reappointed the scientist to lead the research project.
